title: Mir Yeshiva Joins Yerushalayim Rally
body: Mir Yeshiva's talmidim will march with roshei yeshiva and rabbonim to a Yerushalayim rally protesting the arrest of bnei yeshiva for learning Torah.

title: Rav Meir Shapiro's Yahrtzeit
body: Rav Meir Shapiro zt”l's dream of global Daf Yomi learning unites tens of thousands worldwide. His legacy is honored on his yahrtzeit, 7 Cheshvan.

title: Rabbis Lead Yerushalayim Protest
body: Hundreds of thousands to protest in Yerushalayim against the government's giyus decree and arrests of yeshiva bochurim. Gedolei Yisroel will join the masses in tefillah from balconies along Yirmiyahu and Sarei Yisrael Streets.
